byline.contributor: David Waldstein (pronounced Wald-STINE) also reported from Arlington, Tex.

abstract: St Louis Cardinals' bullpen miscommunication that marked Game 5 of the World Series tripped over simple like Jason Motte but not, amazingly enough, Marc Rzepczynski, who is nicknamed Scrabble for the complex array of consonants that populate his 11-letter name.
snippet: The Cardinals’ bullpen miscommunication that marked Game 5 tripped over simpler names like Motte and Lynn but not, amazingly enough, Rzepczynski.
lead_paragraph: The Cardinals’ bullpen miscommunication that marked Game 5 tripped over simpler names like Motte and Lynn but not, amazingly enough, Rzepczynski.

headline.main: The Only St. Louis Pitcher’s Name That La Russa Got Right
headline.print_headline: The Only Name That La Russa Made Clear
headline.seo: World Series: Rzepczynski Is the Only Pitcher’s Name That La Russa Got Right
